plugin.name: vertical_expo
plugin._long: A plugin to show the current workspace row as a cube.

option.name: activate
option._long: Activates the cube with the specified button.

option.name: rotate_left
option._long: Rotates left with the specified activator.

option.name: rotate_right
option._long: Rotates right with the specified activator.

option.name: rotate_up
option._long: Moves to the workspace row above with the specified activator.

option.name: rotate_down
option._long: Moves to the workspace row below with the specified activator.

option.name: deform
option._long: Specifies the deformation to be used.

option.name: light
option._long: Specifies whether to use lighting.

group._long: Creates a larger cube showing only windows without background.

option.name: enable_window_popout
option._long: Enables rendering of a larger cube showing only windows floating above the main cube.

option.name: popout_scale
option._long: Sets how much larger the window popout cube should be compared to the main cube. 1.0 = same size, 1.2 = 20% larger.

option.name: popout_opacity
option._long: Sets the opacity of the window popout cube. 1.0 = fully opaque, 0.5 = semi-transparent.

group._long: Settings for the top and bottom caps of the cube.

option.name: enable_caps
option._long: Enables rendering of top and bottom caps on the cube. Caps are N-sided polygons matching the number of workspace faces.

option.name: cap_alpha
option._long: Sets the transparency of the cube caps. 1.0 = fully opaque, 0.0 = fully transparent.

option.name: cap_color_top
option._long: Sets the color/tint for the top cap of the cube.

option.name: cap_color_bottom
option._long: Sets the color/tint for the bottom cap of the cube.

option.name: cap_texture_top
option._long: Loads the specified texture for the top cap. Leave empty to use solid color.

option.name: cap_texture_bottom
option._long: Loads the specified texture for the bottom cap. Leave empty to use solid color.

option.name: zoom
option._long: Sets the level of zoom out. Setting the value to **0.0** means to not zoom out.

option.name: initial_animation
option._long: Sets the initial animation duration in milliseconds.

option.name: speed_zoom
option._long: Sets the speed factor for zooming.

option.name: speed_spin_horiz
option._long: Sets the velocity of horizontal spinning.

option.name: speed_spin_vert
option._long: Sets the velocity of vertical spinning.

option.name: background_mode
option._long: Sets the background mode.

option.name: background
option._long: Sets the background color for the simple background mode.

option.name: skydome_mirror
option._long: Specifies whether to mirror skydome.

option.name: skydome_texture
option._long: Loads the specified texture for the skydome background mode.

option.name: cubemap_image
option._long: Loads the specified image for the cubemap background mode.
